product_name: Ibex Indie Full-Zip Bike Jersey - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Made with high-quality merino wool, the Ibex Indie Full-Zip bike jersey regulates temperature well to keep you comfortable on the morning commute and weekend group rides. Made of soft, nonirritating 18.5-micron merino wool, this top insulates, wicks away moisture and resists odors-naturally. Raglan sleeves allow unhindered shoulder movement. Three back pockets hold your snacks and bike tools. Reflective logo on back increases your visibility at night. The Ibex Indie Full-Zip bike jersey has a semifitted cut; machine washable. Wool meets Zque(TM) standards, ensuring environmental, social and economic sustainability, as well as animal welfare and traceability back to the source. Closeout.
short_description: Made with high-quality merino wool, the Ibex Indie Full-Zip bike jersey regulates temperature well to keep you comfortable on the morning commute and weekend group rides.
